document_data.name:
Maelaeve Belvrost
({{former}} Maelaeve Firiptar)
document_data.mainbody: '''Maelaeve Belvrost''' was the matriarch of the [[Belvrost]] clan of mages as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Maelaeve raised the best [[brownflower]] mushrooms anywhere, and knew her way around medicines. She was a local source for [[slitherstill]].
document_data.Possessions: She dwelt in the family manor at [[Sundstone]], in the hamlet of [[Baernwood]].
